## IAssignmentEvent interface

Holds data about the variation a subject was assigned to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAssignmentEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [experiment](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmentevent.experiment.md) | string | An Eppo experiment key |
|  [subject](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmentevent.subject.md) | string | The entity or user that was assigned to a variation |
|  [subjectAttributes](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmentevent.subjectattributes.md) | Record&lt;string, any&gt; |  |
|  [timestamp](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmentevent.timestamp.md) | string | The time the subject was exposed to the variation. |
|  [variation](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmentevent.variation.md) | string | The assigned variation |
